code: import moment from'moment-timezone';var dateRangeLabels={s:'few seconds',ss:'%d seconds',m:'1 minute',mm:'%d minutes',h:'1 hour',hh:'%d hours',d:'1 day',dd:'%d days',M:'1 month',MM:'%d months',y:'1 year',yy:'%d years'};export var formattedDateDifference=function formattedDateDifference(fromDate){var toDate=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:moment.utc();moment.updateLocale('en',{relativeTime:dateRangeLabels});var fromUTC=moment.utc(fromDate);var toUTC=moment.utc(toDate);var difference=toUTC.from(fromUTC,true);moment.updateLocale('en',null);return"".concat(difference," ago");};
